code: import{createStore}from'redux';import reducer from"./reducer";var saveToLocalStorage=function saveToLocalStorage(state){try{localStorage.setItem('state',JSON.stringify(state));}catch(e){console.error(e);}};var loadFromLocalStorage=function loadFromLocalStorage(){try{var stateStr=localStorage.getItem('state');return stateStr?JSON.parse(stateStr):undefined;}catch(e){console.error(e);return undefined;}};var persistedStore=loadFromLocalStorage();var store=createStore(reducer,persistedStore);store.subscribe(function(){saveToLocalStorage(store.getState());});export default store;
